README: When developing new views or URLs, please add a check for accessibility as seen below.
If further actions are required at a given URL, use the 'actions' array to carry out the necessary steps.
If tests fail due to timeouts, try walking through tests manually.
See info on actions here: https://github.com/pa11y/pa11y#actions
To fire onChange when altering a select menu, use 'set field' followed by 'check field'.
To check a checkbox, use click element label (of the checkbox)

EXAMPLE.notes: an optional note explaining the intent for this particular url, in which all actions must complete successfully before pa11y tests the page content
EXAMPLE.url: http://example.com/my-url?parameter=value&info=(optional string to distinguish this case from others if it should fail)

urls.notes: expose all hidden elements on start-a-case
actions: wait for element label#hasIrsNotice-0 to be visible
wait for button.case-difference to be visible
wait for label#proc-type-0 to be visible
